title: Possible (political party) - Wikipedia
snippet: Possible (Italian: Possibile, Pos) is a left-wing political party in Italy, launched in Rome on 21 June 2015. The party's founder is Giuseppe Civati, a former prominent member of the Democratic Party (PD).

title: Italy: Political parties at a glance

title: Italian Popular Party | History & Politics | Britannica
snippet: In January 1919 a Sicilian priest, Luigi Sturzo, founded the original Italian Popular Party. Its tight organization and discipline won it quick success. In 1919 the party won 101 of 508 seats in the Chamber of Deputies, and PPI ministers were ...

title: Italy's 5-Star leader dumps party founder, comedian Grillo | Reuters
snippet: ROME, Oct 24 (Reuters) - Italy's 5-Star Movement will sever ties with its founder, comedian Beppe Grillo, due to his "acts of sabotage", party leader and former premier Giuseppe Conte said in book excerpts published on Thursday.
